attributes.action: help close down the most stupid idea of  a business ever.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
well, a website has opened up called the PGTA. apparently they make noobs pro.

many people around the gaming community including members of the popular 'enemydown' website are outraged that the PGTA are bringing a plague of mockery to to community and all of those involved. 

many people including myself are dissapointed in certain persons letting enemydown be affiliated with the PGTA.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
